modName: YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight's animation to twohanded swords
descriptionHtml:
All credits goes to the creator of YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight Â (yukl)
<br /><br /><br /><br />http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33914/?
<br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br />[b]Description:
<br /><br /><br /><br />[/b]This mod makes the animations of Mystic Knight mod to be used with twohanded swords.
<br /><br /><br /><br />I'd just simply renamed some files so that it can be used with 2h.
<br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br />For this to work(especially those awesome equip/unequip animations) you'll need to download:
<br /><br /><br /><br />http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59006/?
<br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br />(This mod makes the twohanded swords be sheathed on the hips/waist, this mod is a must if you want the equip/unequip animations.)
<br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br />
author: nosepicker
